name: planning-schema
description: JSON Schema for xAI Structured Outputs API - enforces valid planning response format

changelog.1.3.0: Added request_content action type for file awareness system (AI requests how to receive large file content)
changelog.1.2.0: Added analyze and extract action types for local file analysis
changelog.1.1.0: Added patterns array for fallback glob patterns, fallbackAction field, required flag

summary.description: Brief description of what needs to be done

type.description: Action type: file (load), url (fetch), analyze (run command), extract (get lines), request_content (request large file content)

filePath.description: For request_content: path to the large file

deliveryMethod.description: For request_content: how to receive content (chunk=full file in chunks, analyze=run command, extract=get line range)

pattern.description: Primary glob pattern for file type (deprecated - use patterns array)

patterns.description: Glob patterns to try in order (first match wins). Most specific first.

url.description: URL to fetch for url type

command.description: Shell command to run for analyze type (grep, head, tail, etc.)

outputHint.description: Expected output format hint for analyze type

destinationFile.description: Optional destination file to save extracted content

required.description: If true, task cannot proceed without this file

fallbackAction.description: What to do if all patterns fail
